channel.title: Data source connection issue
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
Hello, I am new to redash and I am having an issue connecting to a data source. I know my credentials are correct as I have connected to this server through other means but I am getting an error every time I try to connect through redash. Error code 20017 and error code 20002. ![Screen Shot 2022-03-23 at 2.28.20 PM|593x499](upload://5LDLYWWIx2L9COaNJ1iAcKPAsZX.png)
This is a screen shot of my setting and error code. Any help would be greatly appreciated, thanks!
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8.0.0+b32245 (a16f551e * Browser/OS: osx 10.13 Chrome 99.0.4844.83 * How did you install Redash: Setup script

item.title: Data source connection issue
item.dc:creator: Dmurphy
item.description:
That makes sense, I will give that a try. Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Data source connection issue
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
That’s the IP address of the old hosted Redash platform which doesn’t exist anymore. They need to whitelist your IP address.

Read full topic

item.title: Data source connection issue
item.dc:creator: Dmurphy
item.description:
I thought that as well, I had the company administering our server whitelist 52.71.84.157

Are there any others I need?

Read full topic

item.title: Data source connection issue
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Maybe a firewall is blocking traffic between Redash and your server?

Read full topic
